<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"ReportedCheckpointBtcHeight"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/babylon/monitor/v1/checkpoints/{ckpt_hash}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



ReportedCheckpointBtcHeight returns the BTC light client height at which
the checkpoint with the given hash is reported back to Babylon

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"ckpt_hash is hex encoded byte string of the hash of the checkpoint","in":"path","name":"ckpt_hash","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"properties":{"btc_light_client_height":{"format":"int64","title":"height of btc light client when checkpoint is reported","type":"integer"}},"title":"QueryReportedCheckpointBtcHeightResponse defines a response type for\nReportedCheckpointBtcHeight RPC method","type":"object"}}},"description":"A successful response."},"default":{"content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"properties":{"code":{"format":"int32","type":"integer"},"details":{"items":{"properties":{"type_url":{"type":"string"},"value":{"format":"byte","type":"string"}},"type":"object"},"type":"array"},"error":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object"}}},"description":"An unexpected error response."}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
